definition: bladder 氣|气[qi4] transformation in TCM

sentences.chinese: 臨牀上往往伴發急性膀胱炎。

sentences.english: The recipient bladder and donor bladder patch were then anastomosed.

sentences.english: Transurethral resection of posterior lip of cervix vesicae is an effective therapeutic method.
sentences.chinese: 經尿道膀胱頸部後脣切除爲有效的治療方法。

sentences.english: But there are a lot of patients with prostate enlargement, suffer from bladder calculi are not aware of it.

sentences.english: There were no remarkable findings on cystoscopic examination.

sentences.english: The bladder is then implanted into a patient, where the scaffold gradually dissolves.

sentences.english: Infection of road unloading make water basically includes cystitis and urethritis .
sentences.chinese: 下尿路感染主要包括膀胱炎和尿道炎。

sentences.english: This is the end point of the Bladder Meridian of Foot-Taiyin, from where it reaches to the Foot-Shaoyin Meridian.
sentences.chinese: 此係足太陽膀胱經末穴，從這裏到達足少陰腎經。

sentences.english: Note also that a yellowish-brown calculus formed in the bladder.

sentences.english: The smaller pieces are suctioned after the bladder has been flushed. This usually takes many flushings with sterile saline.
sentences.chinese: 膀胱被消毒鹽水沖洗以後會變的小一些。

sentences.english: The length of a film should be directly related to the endurance of the human bladder.
sentences.chinese: 電影的長度應該和人的膀胱的忍受力相連。

sentences.english: Then the labeled bladder cancer cells were implanted into the nude mice bladder by intravesical instillation.
sentences.chinese: 採用經尿道膀胱灌注法使腫瘤細胞種植於膀胱黏膜。

sentences.english: Objective:To evaluate the clinical effect of transurethral electrovaparization in treatment of bladder tumor.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討經尿道電汽化治療膀胱腫瘤的臨牀療效。

sentences.english: ObjectiveTo study the effect of the treatment of BPH complicated with vesical calculus.
